channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS

item.title: CVE-2020-35616|2024-08-04T17:09:14.691Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 1.7.0 through 3.9.22. Lack of input validation while handling ACL rulesets can cause write ACL violations.

item.title: CVE-2021-23131|2024-08-04T08:43:29.330Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.2.0 through 3.9.24. Missing input validation within the template manager.

item.title: CVE-2022-23801|2024-08-04T08:43:27.052Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Possible XSS atack vector through SVG embedding in com_media.

item.title: CVE-2021-26039|2024-08-04T08:43:25.768Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.27. Inadequate escaping in the imagelist view of com_media leads to a XSS vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-23123|2024-08-04T08:43:24.442Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.23. The lack of ACL checks in the orderPosition endpoint of com_modules leak names of unpublished and/or inaccessible modules.

item.title: CVE-2022-23798|2024-08-04T08:43:20.836Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Inadequate validation of URLs could result into an invalid check whether an redirect URL is internal or not.

item.title: CVE-2021-26040|2024-08-04T08:43:19.507Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0. The media manager does not correctly check the user's permissions before executing a file deletion command.

item.title: CVE-2021-26035|2024-08-04T08:43:15.577Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.27. Inadequate escaping in the rules field of the JForm API leads to a XSS vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-35612|2024-08-04T17:09:14.131Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.22. The folder parameter of mod_random_image lacked input validation, leading to a path traversal vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-23132|2024-08-04T08:43:08.799Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.24. com_media allowed paths that are not intended for image uploads

item.title: CVE-2021-23126|2024-08-04T08:43:07.439Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.2.0 through 3.9.24. Usage of the insecure rand() function within the process of generating the 2FA secret.

item.title: CVE-2021-23124|2024-08-04T08:43:05.202Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.9.0 through 3.9.23. The lack of escaping in mod_breadcrumbs aria-label attribute allows XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-23800|2024-08-04T08:43:03.881Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Inadequate content filtering leads to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2022-27913|2024-08-04T08:43:02.488Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.2.0 through 4.2.3. Inadequate filtering of potentially malicious user input leads to reflected XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2023-23752|2024-08-04T08:42:59.915Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.7. An improper access check allows unauthorized access to webservice endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2021-26029|2024-08-04T08:42:57.347Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 1.6.0 through 3.9.24. Inadequate filtering of form contents could allow to overwrite the author field.

item.title: CVE-2022-23799|2024-08-04T08:42:54.784Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Under specific circumstances, JInput pollutes method-specific input bags with $_REQUEST data.

item.title: CVE-2021-26033|2024-08-04T08:42:52.236Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.26. A missing token check causes a CSRF vulnerability in the AJAX reordering endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2023-40626|2024-08-04T08:42:50.939Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The language file parsing process could be manipulated to expose environment variables. Environment variables might contain sensible information.

item.title: CVE-2021-23130|2024-08-04T08:42:49.568Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.24. Missing filtering of feed fields could lead to xss issues.

item.title: CVE-2023-23755|2024-08-04T08:42:41.848Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.2.0 through 4.3.1. The lack of rate limiting allowed brute force attacks against MFA methods.

item.title: CVE-2022-27914|2024-08-04T08:42:39.549Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.4. Inadequate filtering of potentially malicious user input leads to reflected XSS vulnerabilities in com_media.

item.title: CVE-2023-23754|2024-08-04T08:42:38.179Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.2.0 through 4.3.1. Lack of input validation caused an open redirect and XSS issue within the new mfa selection screen.

item.title: CVE-2022-23793|2024-08-04T08:42:35.863Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Extracting an specifilcy crafted tar package could write files outside of the intended path.

item.title: CVE-2022-23797|2024-08-04T08:42:33.127Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Inadequate filtering on the selected Ids on an request could resulted into an possible SQL injection.

item.title: CVE-2022-23794|2024-08-04T08:42:29.418Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Uploading a file name of an excess length causes the error. This error brings up the screen with the path of the source code of the web application.

item.title: CVE-2021-26032|2024-08-04T08:42:23.462Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.26. HTML was missing in the executable block list of MediaHelper::canUpload, leading to XSS attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-23128|2024-08-04T08:42:19.495Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.2.0 through 3.9.24. The core shipped but unused randval implementation within FOF (FOFEncryptRandval) used an potential insecure implemetation. That has now been replaced with a call to 'random_bytes()' and its backport that is shipped within random_compat.

item.title: CVE-2020-35615|2024-08-04T17:09:14.243Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.22. A missing token check in the emailexport feature of com_privacy causes a CSRF vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-26030|2024-08-04T08:42:15.935Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.25. Inadequate escaping allowed XSS attacks using the logo parameter of the default templates on error page

item.title: CVE-2021-23125|2024-08-04T08:42:14.555Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.1.0 through 3.9.23. The lack of escaping of image-related parameters in multiple com_tags views cause lead to XSS attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-26038|2024-08-04T08:42:13.249Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.27. Install action in com_installer lack the required hardcoded ACL checks for superusers. A default system is not affected cause the default ACL for com_installer is limited to super users already.

item.title: CVE-2023-23750|2024-08-04T08:42:11.976Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.6. A missing token check causes a CSRF vulnerability in the handling of post-installation messages.

item.title: CVE-2022-27911|2024-08-04T08:42:10.716Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.2.0. Multiple Full Path Disclosures because of missing '_JEXEC or die check' caused by the PSR12 changes.

item.title: CVE-2021-26028|2024-08-04T08:42:07.514Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.24. Extracting an specifilcy crafted zip package could write files outside of the intended path.

item.title: CVE-2021-26027|2024-08-04T08:42:04.824Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.24. Incorrect ACL checks could allow unauthorized change of the category for an article.

item.title: CVE-2021-26034|2024-08-04T08:42:02.199Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.26. A missing token check causes a CSRF vulnerability in data download endpoints in com_banners and com_sysinfo.

item.title: CVE-2022-23795|2024-08-04T08:42:00.805Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. A user row was not bound to a specific authentication mechanism which could under very special circumstances allow an account takeover.

item.title: CVE-2021-26036|2024-08-04T08:41:57.898Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.27. Missing validation of input could lead to a broken usergroups table.

item.title: CVE-2020-35611|2024-08-04T17:09:14.043Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.22. The globlal configuration page does not remove secrets from the HTML output, disclosing the current values.

item.title: CVE-2022-23796|2024-08-04T08:41:55.663Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.7.0 through 3.10.6. Lack of input validation could allow an XSS attack using com_fields.

item.title: CVE-2023-23751|2024-08-04T08:41:53.095Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.4. A missing ACL check allows non super-admin users to access com_actionlogs.

item.title: CVE-2021-26031|2024-08-04T08:41:51.801Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.25. Inadequate filters on module layout settings could lead to an LFI.

item.title: CVE-2020-35610|2024-08-04T17:09:14.126Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.22. The autosuggestion feature of com_finder did not respect the access level of the corresponding terms.

item.title: CVE-2020-35613|2024-08-04T17:09:14.337Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.22. Improper filter blacklist configuration leads to a SQL injection vulnerability in the backend user list.

item.title: CVE-2021-23129|2024-08-04T08:41:47.368Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.24. Missing filtering of messages showed to users that could lead to xss issues.

item.title: CVE-2022-27912|2024-08-04T08:41:44.795Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.3. Sites with publicly enabled debug mode exposed data of previous requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-23127|2024-08-04T08:41:43.519Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.2.0 through 3.9.24. Usage of an insufficient length for the 2FA secret accoring to RFC 4226 of 10 bytes vs 20 bytes.

item.title: CVE-2020-35614|2024-08-04T17:09:14.504Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.9.0 through 3.9.22. Improper handling of the username leads to a user enumeration attack vector in the backend login page.

item.title: CVE-2021-26037|2024-08-04T08:41:38.766Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.27. CMS functions did not properly termine existing user sessions when a user's password was changed or the user was blocked.

item.title: CVE-2024-21729|2024-08-02T04:34:57.555Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.

item.title: CVE-2024-21725|2024-08-02T04:34:26.678Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate escaping of mail addresses lead to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2024-21723|2024-08-02T04:34:22.675Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate parsing of URLs could result into an open redirect.

item.title: CVE-2024-26279|2024-08-02T04:34:07.431Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The wrapper extensions do not correctly validate inputs, leading to XSS vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-21724|2024-08-02T04:33:59.883Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation for media selection fields lead to XSS vulnerabilities in various extensions.

item.title: CVE-2024-26278|2024-08-02T04:33:52.095Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The Custom Fields component not correctly filter inputs, leading to a XSS vector.

item.title: CVE-2024-21722|2024-08-02T04:33:50.743Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The MFA management features did not properly terminate existing user sessions when a user's MFA methods have been modified.

item.title: CVE-2024-21726|2024-08-02T04:33:44.446Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate content filtering leads to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2024-21730|2024-08-02T04:33:43.196Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The fancyselect list field layout does not correctly escape inputs, leading to a self-XSS vector.

item.title: CVE-2024-21731|2024-08-02T04:33:41.988Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Improper handling of input could lead to an XSS vector in the StringHelper::truncate method.

item.title: CVE-2024-21729|2024-08-01T22:27:35.802Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.

item.title: CVE-2024-21725|2024-08-01T22:27:35.950Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate escaping of mail addresses lead to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2024-21723|2024-08-01T22:27:36.261Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate parsing of URLs could result into an open redirect.

item.title: CVE-2024-21724|2024-08-01T22:27:36.037Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation for media selection fields lead to XSS vulnerabilities in various extensions.

item.description: The MFA management features did not properly terminate existing user sessions when a user's MFA methods have been modified.

item.description: Inadequate content filtering leads to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.description: The fancyselect list field layout does not correctly escape inputs, leading to a self-XSS vector.

item.description: Improper handling of input could lead to an XSS vector in the StringHelper::truncate method.

item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.

item.description: The Custom Fields component not correctly filter inputs, leading to a XSS vector.
